completeShipment(uint256).details: Complete a shipment. Only the reciever can call this. Resolved by EAS.

params._settlementDuration: How long the courier has to complete the shipment

deliverShipment(uint256).details: Deliver a shipment. Only the courier can call this. Resolved by EAS.

returns._0: Whether the resolver supports ETH transfers.

params.values: Explicit ETH amounts which were sent with each attestation.

returns._0: Whether all the attestations are valid.

params.attestations: The existing attestations to be revoked.
params.values: Explicit ETH amounts which were sent with each revocation.

returns._0: Whether the attestations can be revoked.

params.attestation: The existing attestation to be revoked.

returns._0: Whether the attestation can be revoked.
Semver contract version as a string.

attest((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint64,ui.notice: Processes an attestation and verifies whether it's valid.

disburse(uint256).notice: Called by the receiver. Only if the receiver is happy with the shipment, the courier gets paid.

dispute(uint256,address).notice: Receiver or courier is unhappy, can file a dispute

isPayable().notice: Checks if the resolver can be sent ETH.

multiAttest((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint.notice: Processes multiple attestations and verifies whether they are valid.

multiRevoke((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint.notice: Processes revocation of multiple attestation and verifies they can be revoked.

revoke((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint64,ui.notice: Processes an attestation revocation and verifies if it can be revoked.

settle(uint256).notice: If nobody did anything after the deadline, then the settlement can be made Anyone can call this. In the future, you can incentivize by giving a cut to the caller

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.
